v1.19.0.description: fixes issue with missing left/right padding for text on smaller viewports

v1.17.0.description: fixes an issue where focus would accidentally be set and potentially scroll the browser when the multi-feature first initializes
fixes an issue where image pivots did not have a focus state

v1.16.0.description: fixes an issue where the active content did not update on swipe

v1.15.0.description: fixes an issue where the flipper arrows do not work when screen width is less than the width of the content
fixes the controls not working via mouse click in Firefox

v1.13.0.description: fixes spacing issues on paragraphs and headings

v1.12.0.description: adds a new multi-feature module for displaying features with additional content
